title: Introduction to C Programming
description: Learn the fundamentals of C programming language, including syntax, data types, and control structures. Develop essential programming skills for software development.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Explore algorithmic concepts and problem-solving techniques. Understand key algorithm design paradigms and their applications in solving real-world problems.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Gain proficiency in C++ programming and its application in Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA). Develop problem-solving skills using C++ language features.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Build a strong foundation in fundamental data structures such as arrays, linked lists, and trees. Learn how to implement and manipulate data structures efficiently.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Explore the principles of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) using Python. Learn to design and implement classes, objects, and inheritance in Python applications.

title: Software Engineering
description: Understand the principles and practices of software engineering. Cover topics such as requirements analysis, design patterns, and software testing.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: Explore Amazon Web Services (AWS) and cloud computing concepts. Learn to deploy and manage scalable applications in the cloud environment.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Master the basics of database management using MySQL. Learn to design and implement relational databases, query data, and ensure data integrity.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Enhance your problem-solving skills through hands-on exercises and real-world scenarios. Apply critical thinking to solve complex problems efficiently.
